name: Jane Doe
bio: Jane specializes in handcrafted pottery and has over 10 years of experience in ceramic art.
story: Jane finds inspiration in nature and often incorporates natural textures and colors into her pottery.

name: John Smith
bio: John is a woodworker known for his attention to detail and love of sustainable materials.
story: John’s work reflects his philosophy of “reuse and repurpose” with a focus on sustainability.
